name: Find The Backdoor
description:
Find The Backdoor is a single-player indie horror game where you have to survive at the entities present in the different levels. Let yourself be immersed in a horrific experience and try to reveal all the achievements to complete the game at 100%.
The game is played in first person without being able to defend yourself against enemies.
Understand the nuts and bolts of each level for can complete them successfully.

The experience is based purely on gameplay and immersion, leaving aside a long storyline.
Explore 5 unique maps, each offering a different gameplay experience. Dark corridor, labyrinth, gloomy mansion and various entities await you in this horror adventure. A single objective for you: unlock the door to the next level by collecting the requested items, solving riddles or simply running...
Sometimes you will feel safe and sometimes in danger.
Challenge yourself to win.

Developed with the Unreal Engine, this game offers decent graphics for an independent game.
The Steam achievement system is interwoven with the game in order to offer you various secrets to search for on the different maps.
Wearing a helmet is recommended for better immersion.
Inspired by the concept of Backrooms.

Estimated playing time: 1 to 2 hours.
